tweets.text:
Next in our #PFR workshop we hear from Daniel Bond, Deputy Director for Strategy & Engagement from the @EnvAgency, explaining the shift in managing flood risk and how important #innovation will be in the future.

#PFR #PFRWorkshop #Innovation https://t.co/Rp6urupkbp

Excited to begin work on a nature recovery network for Leicestershire and Rutland with @NatForestCo, @LeicsWildlife, @Leicester_News, @LeicsCountyHall, @EnvAgencyMids and more. @NaturalEngland #TogetherForNature https://t.co/bRXkpV9WBx

@AlbionSalter @lb_southwark @LDN_environment @ParksforLondon @EnvAgency @WildLondon @GreenLondonAMs @LdnConservative @LondonLibDems @BurgessPk @DefraGovUK @JohnsonSitu @BillWilliams01 @steviecryan @CWmasterplan @BritishLandPLC Southwark Council's Planners are directly and severely harming our public realm including Burgess Park and Liverpool Grove Conservation Area. The harm may have to come to 'fruition' before they are stopped. It will then be too late. Planning based on greed, not public good.
They should stand up and be counted. And where are @EnvAgency in all of this? "It's our job to look after your environment and create better places for people and wildlife." https://t.co/TCfxg86Gso

Congratulations to @Deploywater for winning the ARTSTHREAD Global Design Graduate Show 2020! An excellent humanitarian project with a lot of hard work put in by their team.

Visit their website to find out more about their project: https://t.co/DqDr8Jcnsq https://t.co/Htp4NLInSJ
